definition: someone/a certain person/some people/I (self-address after one's surname)

sentences.english: Each plug-in has access to information about a personâ ™s current location whereabouts. The location information includes
sentences.chinese: 各插件都可访问关于某人当前位置所在的信息。

sentences.english: Smart people say dumb stuff when faced with someone else's pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 潇洒的人说面临某人怀孕时没有发言权。

sentences.english: The essential property of vocational education--primary vocationization;
sentences.chinese: 某物或某人所特有的本质属性。

sentences.english: The gifts of charity meddled with a man's private affair.
sentences.chinese: 慈善团体的赠品受到了某人私人事务的干涉。

sentences.english: One afternoon someone noticed a slight yellowish-brown tint in the spring .
sentences.chinese: 一个下午某人在春天注意了轻微的淡黄棕色的色彩。

sentences.english: or to exhort somebody to do something or not to do something.
sentences.chinese: 或者劝告某人做或不做一些事情。

sentences.english: It is a great honor to be looked up to by someone.
sentences.chinese: 被某人看得起是一项很大的荣耀。

sentences.english: Watch sb. as a cat watches a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 象猫盯耗子般地盯着某人。

sentences.english: These nouns denote the qualities in a person that permit o. r facilitate achievement o. r accomplishment.
sentences.chinese: 这些名词都表示某人具有取得进步或成功的素质。

sentences.english: How to deal with someone who intimidates you.
sentences.chinese: 如何处理与某人谁恐吓你。

sentences.english: but rather when you're telling somebody that they should or should not do something.
sentences.chinese: 而是用于告诉某人他们应该做或者不应该做某事。

sentences.english: The third reason to love someone is despite who they are.
sentences.chinese: 爱上某人的第三个原因是不管他们是怎样的人。

sentences.english: The court distrained property from him.
My paranoid supporters thought I’d been set up by somebody.
sentences.chinese: 我的一些多疑的支持者们认为我是被某人算计了。

definition: lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
inadvertent/accidental/to have no intention of (doing sth)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
to have a mind to/to intend to/deliberately/considerate
